conversion_verification.notes: Second image appears to be a top-down rendered/colored floor plan with soft shading; it does not show vertical wall faces, true wall height, or an angled/isometric viewpoint.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Automatic rejection (E0-FATAL): no true 3D wall height/side surfaces and view remains pure top-down.

detected_errors.description: Not a true 3D conversion: no visible wall height or multi-surface wall geometry; rendered image remains an orthographic top-down plan.

summary: The second image is a top-down stylized render of the 2D plan rather than a geometrically faithful 3D cutaway with visible wall height and angled perspective.
